ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_wqssw8xfup_html:
“As far as canned mocktails go, 
Jeng is EASILY the best...
If you love sweet, 
fruity cocktails as much as me, 
these will 1,000% be your new favorites.”
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_edgj0v7udtp_html:
“This ginger-lime CBD sparkler 
uses a hint of juniper 
to mimic the flavors of a 
traditional Moscow Mule, 
and it’s delicious straight.”
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_s4eqn8c3gae_html:
“This sparkling cocktail 
has 11 milligrams broad-spectrum hemp
extract per 12-ounce can, 
but it won't get you high or cause any impairment!"
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_3yohu6xp1p5_html:
Looking for a refreshing and elevated summer drink? 
Try a sparkling THC cocktail!
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_84ypro3t0yt_html: Indulge in a sensory experience like no other with our exquisite collection of fresh juices.
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_00blm8l5x2oit_html: Introducing the perfect blend of tradition and innovation - our new mixed drinks that puts a fresh spin on the classic cocktail!
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_z13273xbvz_html:
Our flagship soft cocktail takes its inspiration from the classic Moscow Mule. Ginger-forward with a sparkling burst of lime. Microdosed for your sipping pleasure. Less than 1/3 of the sugar of the average Moscow Mule.

3mg THC + 6mg CBD
broad spectrum hemp extract per can
4 cans per pack
12 ounces per can
 0% alcohol
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_tf6wnsv12fb_html:
We've combined natural juniper and lime juice with just a touch of natural hemp extract to create our refreshing and unique jeng & tonic. It's the classic cocktail reimagined.

3mg THC + 6mg CBD
broad spectrum hemp extract per can
4 cans per pack
12 ounces per can
 0% alcohol
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_s7q28r7rdfi_html:
Have a sip of paradise in your backyard with our THC + CBD margarita.

3mg THC + 6mg CBD
broad spectrum hemp extract per can
4 cans per pack
12 ounces per can
 0% alcohol
ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_98u06vtsla_html:
Have a sip of paradise in your backyard with our THC + CBD margarita.

ecom-blank-template-home.textcontent_yg1zopqvy1n_html:
Born in Montauk, New York.  Made in the USA. Jeng is changing the way people drink. Mixologist-inspired, Jeng provides all the great taste and good feelings of a classic cocktail, but without the alcohol. Microdosed with legal hemp derived THC and CBD for a controlled buzz. 0% Alcohol. 100% Delicious. It's the classic cocktail reimagined.

Join the movement.
ecom-blank-template-home.text0_tq1nemhfis_html: “Jeng is the best tasting non-alcoholic beverage I have ever had.  You got it just right!”
ecom-blank-template-home.text1_tq1nemhfis_html: “If you are searching for an amazing non-alcoholic option, this is the product you need to try.  It actually does what it claims to do, and tastes delicious.  The paloma and jeng & tonic are my favorites!  Thank you @sipjeng!"
ecom-blank-template-home.text2_tq1nemhfis_html: "Deliciously refreshing and YES, it's worth the hype!”

ecom-home-home.headingtext_5yigvdbsal9_html:
The Most Chill Cocktails
For Any Occasion.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_sub3xk4z81_html: This hemp-infused drink is the perfect way to celebrate with friends.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_t51qfsbdyfm_html: Indulge in a sensory experience like no other with our exquisite collection of fresh juices.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_mh9mezg8sf_html: The perfect blend of tradition and innovation - our new mixed drinks put a fresh spin on the classics.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_9v5g1qocxm6_html: With fresh pink grapefruit juice and a microdose of legal hemp-derived THC, it's the perfectly refreshing alcohol-free cocktail for grapefruit lovers, but without the hangover. With a hint of rosemary and lime, you won't be able to resist this delicious twist on a Mexican classic. Low in sugar. Big on flavor.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_ixphlpc20ws_html: Made with fresh juices, this low-sugar THC-infused gem is a refreshing twist on the classic rhubarb spritz for those who love elevated cocktails, but without the hangover. You'll love its strawberry rhubarb notes cooled by a touch of cucumber to beat the heat. With a hint of legal hemp-derived THC and only 9 grams of sugar, it's this summer's guiltless delicacy.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_12gug267swp_html: Made with zesty blood orange juice, this low-sugar THC-infused classic is for those who share our passion for the spicy margarita experience, but without the hangover. Add a kick of jalapeno with a hint of legal hemp-derived THC and it's the perfect balance of heat, flavor and bliss that's sure to be your summer favorite.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_b6sfe9m1bx6_html: This ginger lover's dream is paired with legal hemp-derived THC so you can take the edge off while enjoying this classic without the hangover. Ginger forward with a hint lime and a touch of juniper, this low-sugar, full-flavored spin on a classic is perfect for any occasion.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_ll03mpe3nkl_html: How do you make a gin & tonic without the gin? We’ve combined natural juniper, lime and tonic with 11mg broad spectrum CBD to create the refreshingly unique Jeng & Tonic. Containing less than 1/3 the sugar of the average gin & tonic, it’s the classic cocktail reimagined.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_29r6v6x06n4_html:
Jeng has paired real pink grapefruit juice with rosemary and juniper, added agave and sea salt, then finished it with 11mg of broad spectrum CBD.
Less than 1/3 the sugar of the average Paloma. The result is a fresh spin on the classic Paloma, with all the delicious flavors and good feelings of a craft cocktail, but without the hangover.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_x0or9k0y5me_html: This low-sugar, alt-cocktail takes its inspiration from the classic Moscow Mule. Ginger-forward with a burst of lime and just a hint of juniper, it’s a sparkling cocktail that can be enjoyed on the rocks or straight from the can. All the great taste and good feelings of a classic cocktail without the hangover.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_ee0cxdfhnug_html:
Born in Montauk, New York.  Made in the USA. Jeng is changing the way people drink. Mixologist-inspired, Jeng provides all the great taste and good feelings of a classic cocktail, but without the alcohol. Microdosed with legal hemp derived THC and CBD for a controlled buzz. 

0% Alcohol. 100% Delicious.

Join the movement.

ecom-untitled-list-collections.textcontent_h24le7ykyou_html:
All of the delicious flavors of a craft cocktail with none of the alcohol. Our sparklers can be enjoyed chilled straight from the can or served over ice with the garnish of your choice.Each soft cocktail is infused with real juices and natural ingredients. 
Relax with our new microdosed 3mg THC + 6mg CBD or with our 11mg CBD beverages. It’s the classic cocktail, reimagined.

ecom-this-summers-most-chill-sparkling-p.headingtext_bhf86pa01rn_html:
This Summer’s Most Chill 
Sparkling Cocktails.
ecom-this-summers-most-chill-sparkling-p.textcontent_dh4m4mioxgw_html: Looking for a refreshing and elevated summer drink? Try a sparkling THC cocktail! This hemp-infused drink is the perfect way to beat the heat and elevate your mood. With its bubbly texture and delicious flavor, it's sure to become your new go-to summer cocktail.

ecom-about-us-2-page.textcontent_hg3x6rplsk9_html:
It was 2020 in Montauk, New York. A time to take stock in what's really important in life. We missed the after work happy hours, the spontaneous conversations at the neighborhood bar, the simple pleasure of buying a drink for someone to show your appreciation. 
 
Meanwhile, it seemed like every new product on the market was just another seltzer. Regardless of whether it had booze or hemp in it, they all tasted the same. And to be honest, they didn't taste that good. 

Which brings us to Jeng. 

In a time of undifferentiated seltzers and overwhelming beer and wine options, we wanted to create something completely different. Something complex that delights the senses. Something worth talking about. Something worth sharing. 

Enjoy our twist on cocktail culture.

ecom-wholesale-2-page.textcontent_u5b14bd37w_html:
Interested in selling Jeng alcohol-free sparkling cocktails at your restaurant, bar, hotel, or retail store? 
Send us an email at hello@sipjeng.com and we'll make it happen!

ecom-collections-collection.countdown_title_5eoscl5n16o_html: Hurry up! The sale will end on

ecom-try-all-of-our-all-natural-flavors-.textcontent_zzc2qzb953_html: Indulge in the vibrant and refreshing taste of our all natural flavors, featuring the juicy tartness of grapefruit, the tangy sweetness of rhubarb, the bold citrus notes of blood orange, the spicy kick of ginger, and the piney freshness of juniper.

ecom-our-new-mix-on-the-classic-cocktail.headingtext_nvndxtd479c_html: Our New mix on the Classic Cocktail
ecom-our-new-mix-on-the-classic-cocktail.textcontent_xu2i4nzt9p_html: Introducing the perfect blend of tradition and innovation - our new mixed drink that puts a fresh spin on the classic cocktail! Our expert mixologists have taken the classic cocktail and elevated it to a new level, using the finest ingredients and innovative techniques. Whether you're a seasoned cocktail connoisseur or a curious newcomer, our sparkling cocktails are sure to delight your taste buds.

ecom-give-back-page.textcontent_ti4p08pu6w_html:
Jeng is committed to donating a portion of our profits to social and environmental causes. 

We currently provide in-kind donations to the Illinois Environmental Council, which advances public policies that create healthy environments. We also provide in-kind donations to the Illinois Equal Justice Foundation's "New Leaf Illinois" program, which helps people clear their cannabis convictions. 

Additionally, we support clean water and healthy beaches with in-kind and cash donations to The Surfrider Foundation. 

If you have any questions about our charitable operations (or know an organization that could use some support), feel free to contact us at hello@sipjeng.com.

ecom-standard-contact-page-page.textcontent_2zfuzuh68o3_html:

Got a question or just want to chat? We love talking about all things hemp-infused, alcohol-free, and sober curious. Send us an email using the form below.

ecom-faqs-page.item_title_0_uxvy51s89kk_html: What is a hemp infused cocktail?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_4_uxvy51s89kk_html: Are Delta 9 THC and CBD legal?

ecom-faqs-page.item_title_8_uxvy51s89kk_html: How long does it take to take effect?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_10_uxvy51s89kk_html: Do I need to refrigerate the cans?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_11_uxvy51s89kk_html: How old do I need to be to place an order?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_16_uxvy51s89kk_html: What happens if your cans arrive damaged?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_17_uxvy51s89kk_html: Are you vegan, plant based, gluten free, kosher certified?
ecom-faqs-page.item_title_19_uxvy51s89kk_html: Do you use real fruit juice and all natural ingredients?
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_esnlyb3tiel_html: A hemp-infused cocktail by Jeng is a non-alcoholic sparkling beverage that skillfully blends the principles of classic mixology with the calming effects of organic Delta 9 THC, broad spectrum CBD, or both. The result is a balanced micro-high which provides you a unique experience without the aftermath of a hangover.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_7yea440vykk_html: The 2018 Farm Bill defines hemp as Cannabis sativa L. which contains no more than a 0.3 percent concentration of THC.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_jjmkp900qqd_html: Delta 9 refers to legal hemp-derived THC. As THC is the cannabinoid responsible for making people feel ‘high’, Delta 9 is the most abundant form of THC and was legalized under the 2018 Farm Bill.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_77dmazt91li_html: CBD is derived from legal hemp which has been grown specifically for CBD.  Unlike THC (another cannabinoid), CBD does not intoxicate or get a person “high.”  Hemp derived CBD was legalized under the 2018 Farm Bill.  Many consumers say that CBD helps them take the edge off.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_jf9zxbpg1hs_html: Yes.  Hemp-derived CBD and Delta 9 THC used in Jeng were legalized with the 2018 Farm Bill.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_q72igh4zxqs_html: Jeng transforms classic cocktails with a touch of THC, CBD, or both for a subtle buzz. Our zero-proof drinks mimic the vibe of a glass of wine or beer—light, buzzy, and sociable—minus the hangover or hangxiety. Cheers to a new kind of experience!
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_eewjpnk2k5o_html: Start with a single can and gauge your vibe. Individual effects vary based on personal tolerance. With an onset of about 5-10 minutes, take it slow and savor the experience as you sip!
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_51f36xcbjp3_html: Our THC based cans offer 3 mg of THC and 6mg CBD for that perfect balanced microdose.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_i1wniz8560i_html: Typically, the onset occurs within 5-10 minutes, but it can take up to a half hour for some.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_n21w8skfe0d_html: Jeng is offered in stores across the country which you can learn more about here. We also deliver across the country through online ordering.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_rnp7076yuak_html: No need to refrigerate the cans, as they boast a shelf life of 12 months. For an optimal experience, though, we suggest serving them chilled. Elevate it further by pouring over ice into your preferred cocktail glass, and don't forget to add your favorite garnish!
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_8uigi2y33z_html: Consumers must be 21 or older to legally purchase our THC and CBD products.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_5p2hrkpjsnp_html: We use natural ingredients to create drinks that taste great but are low in sugar.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_kq2j71kwuw_html: Nope, sweet dreams. No energy drink jitters here.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_cphvvke3wy_html: All 50 states. We do not ship internationally at the moment.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_9tz4nryje9n_html: Fingers crossed for smooth deliveries, but accidents can happen. If your goodies don't arrive in tip-top shape, no worries. We've got a 30-day full refund policy. Inspect your order upon arrival, and if there are any hiccups, let us know ASAP. Learn more here.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_zy0h7qgz6wn_html: Absolutely! We've got you covered on all fronts. Our hemp undergoes quality testing to ensure no animal parts, GMOs, and all products are gluten-free, palm oil-free, and kosher certified.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_y9v7x0iz0cc_html: Yes! Our hemp extract is lab tested for solvents, heavy metals, fungicides, pesticides, and microbes. We use all FDA approved, top quality materials in our formula. No animal parts, no GMO, gluten-free, and palm oil free. Kosher certified.
ecom-faqs-page.textcontent_w4uehpxih8e_html: Absolutely! We keep it real with all-natural goodness. Our zesty bliss comes from real fruit juices without any artificial nonsense. Low in sugar, high on flavor!
